Usage

# S4 method for dbData,missing,missing,missing
[(x, i, j)

# S4 method for dbData,missing,missing,ANY
[(x, i, j) <- value

# S4 method for dbMatrix,dbIndex,missing,missing
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = TRUE)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,missing,dbIndex,missing
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = TRUE)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,dbIndex,dbIndex,missing
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = TRUE)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,dbIndex,missing,ANY
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = TRUE)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,missing,dbIndex,ANY
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = TRUE)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,dbIndex,dbIndex,ANY
[(x, i, j, ..., drop = FALSE)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,missing,missing,missing
[(x, i, j)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,missing,missing,ANY
[(x, i, j) <- value

# S4 method for dbDataFrame
names(x)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,dbIndex
names(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbData
rownames(x)

# S4 method for dbMatrix
rownames(x)

# S4 method for dbMatrix
rownames(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbData
colnames(x)

# S4 method for dbMatrix
colnames(x)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,ANY
colnames(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,dbIndex
colnames(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbMatrix
dimnames(x)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,list
dimnames(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbDataFrame
dimnames(x)

# S4 method for dbDataFrame,list
dimnames(x) <- value

# S4 method for dbMatrix,ANY
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for ANY,dbMatrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,dbMatrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,ANY
Ops(e1, e2)

# S4 method for ANY,dbMatrix
Ops(e1, e2)

# S4 method for dbMatrix,dbMatrix
Ops(e1, e2)

rowSums(x, ...)

rowSums(x, ...)

# S4 method for dbDenseMatrix
